title: LF Silver/Gold team Looking to Improve
body:
I am a Silver 2 player, currently on the rise to Gold. Have been playing since late Season 3 but not seriously until Season 4 where I was placed silver at the end of the season. I have over 1000 ranked games in total, 600+ this season alone.  I am looking for a Silver or hopefully Gold ranked 5s team looking to improve and develop as players. I am hoping that with enough time and dedication, reaching a higher rank like Plat for Season 6 will be possible.

I wouldn't say that I main any position, because I can play all positions well, but recently I have been playing a lot more top and jungle, and have found success in these roles. I am pretty decent at both mid and adc too. My worst role is support but as I said I am pretty well rounded in all roles, and if needed can fill the support role.

I have skype, teamspeak and curse voice for communication. 

If anyone has any offers for me just add me in game: GTCookieMonstar
and state why you are adding me.
